body_html:
Edit: #10068 is merged

@aselle I think all my changes are done for this PR, please continue the review process. This op now allows users to specify the axis. I also added one test case to test when axis != 0 and one test case to test when rank > 2. All these tests pass on my machine.

This PR relies on #10032 that has not been merged into master branch yet. I manually merge them into this branch to make this work. So you don't have to worry about changes in shape_inference.cc and cuda_kernel_helper.h because they are reviewed separately. You may not want to merge this before these two dependencies are merged.
